/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise tranquil setting. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image provides a glimpse into the everyday life in Beijing, showcasing the city's blend of natural beauty and urban development.
